compatibility.notes: ECL-1.0 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL due to their requirements for derivative works.

key_requirements: Read and understand the terms of the Educational Community License.
Comply with the obligations when redistributing or modifying the Original Work.
license.name: ECL-1.0
obligations: Include the full text of the Educational Community License in a viewable location.
Include any pre-existing intellectual property disclaimers, notices, or terms and conditions.
Provide notice of any changes or modifications to the Original Work, including the date of changes.
Distribute modifications in a manner that avoids confusion with the Original Work.
